name: OkayEcust
description:
# OkayEcust

Created by Fisher at *2016-09-03 19:48*
此文档创建于 *2016-09-03 19:48*

---

## Guide


- Contains api documents.
- 包含 api 参考文档
- Contains Api unit test scripts.
- 包含单元测试脚本

---


## README

- Contains API status codes list
- 包含 API 状态码列表及释义
- Contains frequently used objects decleration.
- 包含常用对象声明

---

### Global Status Code List
### 全局状态码声明

> [ 10 | 11 | 12 ] may combine to 10 for the securiry reason in the future.
> 为了安全考虑以后全局错误码肯能会只有 [ 10 | 20 | 30 | 40 ], 例如 [ 10 | 11 | 12 ] 全部返回 10

- 10: parameters missed
- 10: 参数丢失
- 11: requested resource permission denied | requested resource not found
- 11: 访问资源权限受限 | 访问的资源不存在
- 12: params format error | params is not expected
- 12: 参数格式错误 | 参数取值范围不是所规定的
- 20: system fatal error | database error
- 20: 系统致命错误 | 系统数据库错误 
- 30: server is busy and rejected request
- 30: 服务器忙拒绝服务
- 40: **token expired.** *Logging in is required*
- 40: 登录标识过期

---

### API Local Status Code List
### API 局部状态码声明


- 80100 account/hello: Offline
- 80200  account/login: failed to login
- 80300 account/password: failed to change password


---

### User Account Type {Number}
### 用户类型 {Number}

- 1-student | 2-teacher | 3-parent | 7-admin
- 1-学生 | 2-老师 | 3-学生监护人 | 7-管理员


---

### User Password Pattern {String}
### 关于用户密码 {String}

- password length should be 32.
- 登录接口密码长度为 32.
- md5('hash-it-happily-' + uid + '$' + password) is recommended.
- 推荐使用 md5('hash-it-happily-' + uid + '$' + password) 来处理用户密码.


---

## Universal Keyword Declaration
## 全局常用字段释义声明

- ctime(created time) 创建时间
- ltime(last modified time) 上次修改时间

---

## Universal Object Defination
## 全局对象格式定义

---

```
define <course-object>
{
  id: <long>                  # 课程id
  author: <string>      # 创建者-老师id
  name: <string>        # 课程名字
  desc: <string>
  students: [<string>]      # 学生id
  time: [            # 课程时间
      type: <int>      # [ 0全周|1单周|2双周 ]
      from: <int>      # 3
      to: <int>      # 18
      location: <string>  # 'a102'
      day: <int>      # 0/周日;4/周四
      time: <int>      # 7800/78节;1234/1234节
  ]
  email: <string>
  tel: <string>
}
```

---

```
define <homework-object>
{
  id: <string>
  cid: <string>      #  class id; 分发班级id
  author: <string>    # 创建者 老师id
  name: <string>
  time:
    from: <long>    # 答题开始时间
    to: <long>
  desc: <string>
  questions: [<string>]  # 题目id 数组
  students: [<string>]  # 做过学生的id
  amountDone: <int>    # n个同学做过
  amountDoing: <int>    # n个同学正在答题
  amountGivenUp: <int>  # n个同学放弃答题
  ctime: <long>
  ltime: <long>
}
```

---

```
define <user-object>
{
  id: <string>
  account
    uid: <string>
    name: <string>
    pwd: <string>
    salt: <string>
    type: <int>                     # {{用户类型}}
  profile
    nick: <string>
    gender: <int>
    avatar: <string>
    motto: <string>
    email: <string>
    tel: <string>
  ecust
    major: <string>            # 学生自然班
    courses: [<string>]          # 学生所上课的id; ?教师所教班级id;
    achievements: [            # 学生成就
      id: <string>
      name: <string>
      desc: <string>
      questions: [<string>]
      answers: [<answer-object>]
      ctime: <long>
      ltime: <long>
    ]
        libraries: [<library-object>]   # 老师创建的题库  
    models: [            # 老师创建的试卷模板
      id: <string>
      name: <string>
      desc: <string>
      questions: [<string>]      # 包含题目id
      ctime: <long>
      ltime: <long>
    ]
}
```

---

```
define <library-object>
{
  id: <string>
  name: <string>
  desc: <string>
  questions: [<string>]      # 包含的题目id
  ctime: <long>
  ltime: <long>
}
```

---

```
define <question-object>
{
  id: <string>
  author: <string>      # 创建者-老师id
  name: <string>        # 问题题干;若为填空题，空格用%%%%n%%%%代替，n表示空格长度;
  type: <int>              # 0-polar-question | 1-single-choice | 2-multiple-choice | 3-blank-filling
  extras: [<string>]        # 选项数组 ['condition', 'condition 2', 'C', 'condition D']
  answers: [<string|boolean>]    # 答案数组 [false, false, true, false]
  ctime: <long>
  ltime: <long>
}
```

requests.tests:
var res = JSON.parse(responseBody);

tests["Update specific quiz"] = res.name;
requests.name: 更新指定Quiz信息
requests.description:
# Update the specific question library
# 更新指定题库信息

> Method: **POST**

---

## Request


- id{String}
    - Library id.
    - 题库 id.
- name{String}
    - Library title.
    - 题库标题
- desc{String} *Optional*
    - Library description.
    - 题库简介信息
- questions{Array}: *Optional*
    - Questions contained in this library.
    - 题库包含的题目

---

## Response

- {{library-object}}
    - Updated library details.
    - 更新后的题库信息

---

requests.name: Login as teacher
requests.description:
# Login to access other authorized apis.
# 用户登录

**Permission: public**

## Request

- uid: User unique ID. 用户帐号
- pwd: User password (length should be 32); 密码且长度为32


## Response

- token
    - User token for later usage.
    - 用户 token 身份标识
- type
    - User account type. ( 1-student | 2-teacher | 3-parent | 7-admin )
    - 用户类型; ( 1-学生 | 2-老师 | 3-学生监护人 | 7-管理员 )

responseCode.name: OK
responseCode.detail: Standard response for successful HTTP requests. The actual response will depend on the request method used. In a GET request, the response will contain an entity corresponding to the requested resource. In a POST request the response will contain an entity describing or containing the result of the action.

headers.name: Access-Control-Allow-Headers
headers.description: Used in response to a preflight request to indicate which HTTP headers can be used when making the actual request.

headers.name: Access-Control-Allow-Methods
headers.description: Specifies the method or methods allowed when accessing the resource. This is used in response to a preflight request.

headers.name: Access-Control-Allow-Origin
headers.description: Specifies a URI that may access the resource. For requests without credentials, the server may specify '*' as a wildcard, thereby allowing any origin to access the resource.

headers.name: Connection
headers.description: Options that are desired for the connection

headers.name: Content-Length
headers.description: The length of the response body in octets (8-bit bytes)

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: The mime type of this content

headers.name: Date
headers.description: The date and time that the message was sent

headers.name: ETag
headers.description: An identifier for a specific version of a resource, often a message digest

headers.name: Vary
headers.description: Tells downstream proxies how to match future request headers to decide whether the cached response can be used rather than requesting a fresh one from the origin server.

headers.name: X-Content-Type-Options
headers.description: The only defined value, "nosniff", prevents Internet Explorer from MIME-sniffing a response away from the declared content-type

headers.name: X-Powered-By
headers.description: Specifies the technology (ASP.NET, PHP, JBoss, e.g.) supporting the web application (version details are often in X-Runtime, X-Version, or X-AspNet-Version)

headers.name: errcode
headers.description: Custom header
The mime type of this content

requests.tests:
var res = JSON.parse(responseBody);

tests["Update Course Info"] = res.name && res._id;
requests.name: 更新指定课程信息
requests.description:
# Update the specific course
# 更新指定课程信息

> Method: **PATCH**

---

# Request

- name{String} *Optional*
    - course title.
    - 课程标题
- desc{String} *Optional*
    - Library description.
    - 课程简介信息
- time[{{course-object.time}}] *Optional*
  - Course time
  - 课程上课时间
- tel{String} *Optional*
  - Telephone of the teacher
  - 老师电话
- email{String} *Optional*
  - Email of the teacher
  - 老师邮箱

---

## Response

- {{library-object}}
    - Created library details.
    - 更新后的课程信息

---

requests.description:
# Create a question library
# 创建一个题库

> Method: **POST**

---

# Request

- name{String}
    - Library title.
    - 题库标题
- desc{String} *Optional*
    - Library description.
    - 题库简介信息
- questions{Array}: *Optional*
    - questions contained in this library.
    - 题库包含的题目

---

## Response

- {{library-object}}
    - Created library details.
    - 创建的题库信息

---


---

requests.name: Login as student
requests.description:
# Login to access other authorized apis.
# 用户登录

**Permission: public**

## Request

- uid: User unique ID. 用户帐号
- pwd: User password (length should be 32); 密码且长度为32


## Response

- token
    - User token for later usage.
    - 用户 token 身份标识
- type
    - User account type. ( 1-student | 2-teacher | 3-parent | 7-admin )
    - 用户类型; ( 1-学生 | 2-老师 | 3-学生监护人 | 7-管理员 )

responseCode.name: OK
responseCode.detail: Standard response for successful HTTP requests. The actual response will depend on the request method used. In a GET request, the response will contain an entity corresponding to the requested resource. In a POST request the response will contain an entity describing or containing the result of the action.

headers.name: Access-Control-Allow-Headers
headers.description: Used in response to a preflight request to indicate which HTTP headers can be used when making the actual request.

headers.name: Access-Control-Allow-Methods
headers.description: Specifies the method or methods allowed when accessing the resource. This is used in response to a preflight request.

headers.name: Access-Control-Allow-Origin
headers.description: Specifies a URI that may access the resource. For requests without credentials, the server may specify '*' as a wildcard, thereby allowing any origin to access the resource.

headers.name: Connection
headers.description: Options that are desired for the connection

headers.name: Content-Length
headers.description: The length of the response body in octets (8-bit bytes)

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: The mime type of this content

headers.name: Date
headers.description: The date and time that the message was sent

headers.name: ETag
headers.description: An identifier for a specific version of a resource, often a message digest

headers.name: Vary
headers.description: Tells downstream proxies how to match future request headers to decide whether the cached response can be used rather than requesting a fresh one from the origin server.

headers.name: X-Content-Type-Options
headers.description: The only defined value, "nosniff", prevents Internet Explorer from MIME-sniffing a response away from the declared content-type

headers.name: X-Powered-By
headers.description: Specifies the technology (ASP.NET, PHP, JBoss, e.g.) supporting the web application (version details are often in X-Runtime, X-Version, or X-AspNet-Version)

headers.name: errcode
headers.description: Custom header
The mime type of this content

创建一个课程
requests.description:
# Create a course
# 创建一个课程

> Method: **POST**

---

# Request

- name{String}
    - course title.
    - 课程标题
- desc{String} *Optional*
    - Library description.
    - 课程简介信息
- time[{{course-object.time}}] *Optional*
  - Course time
  - 课程上课时间
- tel{String} *Optional*
  - Telephone of the teacher
  - 老师电话
- email{String} *Optional*
  - Email of the teacher
  - 老师邮箱

---

## Response

- {{library-object}}
    - Created library details.
    - 创建的课程信息

---
